about.title: About
paragraphs: I'm a passionate AI engineer and startup founder from Bangladesh, driven by the vision of creating intelligent solutions that bridge technology with real-world impact.
From founding AIELTS and winning the UIHP National Award to leading Intelleeo as Chairman, I've dedicated my career to pushing the boundaries of what's possible with AI and machine learning.
My journey combines deep technical expertise with entrepreneurial vision, always focusing on solutions that matter to people and communities.

featuredProjects.title: Featured
featuredProjects.subtitle: Building innovative solutions that make a real impact in the world

heroProject.title: AIELTS - AI-Powered IELTS Preparation Platform
heroProject.description: Revolutionary AI platform that achieved 95% accuracy in IELTS score prediction and helped 10,000+ students improve their scores.

secondaryProjects.title: Intelleeo Platform
secondaryProjects.description: Advanced analytics dashboard for startup metrics and KPI tracking.

secondaryProjects.title: Smart Contract Analyzer
secondaryProjects.description: AI-powered tool for smart contract vulnerability detection.

featuredResearch.title: Featured
featuredResearch.subtitle: Pushing the boundaries of AI and machine learning through innovative research

heroResearch.title: Large Language Models for Bangladeshi Language Processing
heroResearch.description: Groundbreaking research on fine-tuning LLMs for Bengali language understanding, achieving state-of-the-art results in sentiment analysis and machine translation.

secondaryResearch.title: AI-Driven Code Generation for Low-Resource Languages
secondaryResearch.description: Novel approach to automated code generation using multi-modal transformers.

secondaryResearch.title: Federated Learning in Edge Computing
secondaryResearch.description: Privacy-preserving machine learning framework for distributed systems.

testimonials.title: What People
testimonials.subtitle: Testimonials from colleagues, collaborators, and industry leaders

items.name: Dr. Sarah Ahmed
items.content: Sheikh Yeasin's work on Bengali language processing has been groundbreaking. His approach to fine-tuning LLMs shows exceptional understanding of both technical depth and cultural context.

items.name: Rajesh Kumar
items.content: AIELTS has revolutionized how students prepare for language proficiency tests. The AI accuracy and user experience Galib created is truly remarkable.

items.name: Maria Rodriguez
items.content: Working with Galib on research collaborations has been inspiring. His innovative thinking and technical execution consistently exceed expectations.

callToAction.subtitle: Whether you have a project in mind, want to collaborate on research, or just want to connect, I'd love to hear from you.

aboutPage.name: Sheikh Yeasin
aboutPage.title: AI Innovator • Software Engineer • Startup Founder
paragraphs: I'm a passionate AI engineer and startup founder from Bangladesh, driven by creating intelligent solutions that bridge technology with real-world impact.
My journey combines deep technical expertise with entrepreneurial vision, always focusing on solutions that matter to people and communities.

projectsPage.title: Projects &
projectsPage.subtitle: From AI-powered platforms to scalable business solutions — here's what I've built

projects.title: AIELTS - AI-Powered IELTS Platform
projects.description: Revolutionary AI platform for IELTS preparation with 95% accuracy in score prediction. Winner of UIHP National Award.

projects.title: Intelleeo Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: Comprehensive analytics platform for startup metrics and KPI tracking with real-time insights.

projects.title: Smart Contract Security Analyzer
projects.description: AI-powered tool for detecting vulnerabilities in smart contracts with advanced pattern recognition.

projects.title: Bangladesh Tourism Mobile App
projects.description: Flutter-based mobile application promoting tourism in Bangladesh with AR features and local guides.

projects.title: Real-time Collaboration Platform
projects.description: Google Docs-like collaborative platform built from scratch with operational transformation.

projects.title: AI-Powered Content Generator
projects.description: Advanced content generation platform using fine-tuned GPT models for Bengali and English content.

researchPage.title: Research &
researchPage.subtitle: Exploring the frontiers of AI, machine learning, and intelligent systems

research.title: Large Language Models for Bangladeshi Language Processing
research.abstract: Comprehensive study on fine-tuning state-of-the-art LLMs for Bengali language understanding, achieving breakthrough results in sentiment analysis, machine translation, and text generation.

research.title: Federated Learning for Privacy-Preserving Healthcare AI
research.abstract: Novel federated learning framework enabling collaborative medical AI training while maintaining patient privacy across distributed healthcare networks.
research.publication: Under Review at Nature Machine Intelligence

research.title: Real-time Emotion Recognition in Bengali Speech
research.abstract: Deep learning approach for emotion classification in Bengali speech using attention-based neural networks with cultural context awareness.

research.title: Multimodal AI for Educational Content Generation
research.abstract: Innovative multimodal approach combining text, image, and audio for automated educational content creation tailored to individual learning styles.

research.title: Adversarial Robustness in Bengali Text Classification
research.abstract: Comprehensive analysis of adversarial vulnerabilities in Bengali NLP models and development of robust defense mechanisms.

research.title: Neural Architecture Search for Edge AI Deployment
research.abstract: Automated neural architecture search framework optimized for resource-constrained edge devices with emphasis on model efficiency.
